title: Inside Longleat
overview: Behind the scenes of the world-famous Longleat House and Gardens as it celebrates 75 years open to the public. Lord and Lady Bath grant unprecedented access to their stately home and safari park as we meet a wide selection of the 600 people who work there - from animal keepers to cleaners, gardeners to cooks, historians to handymen -as well as many of the estate's 1000 animals, including lions, rhinos, red pandasÂ and koalas.
